snippet: ROAMAN--Joyce, of Hollywood, FL, 89, passed away January 1, 2016. Joyce is predeceased by her husband Alan Norman Roaman and her son Michael Warren Roaman. She is survived by her daughter Judi Roaman and a daughter-in-law Carla Chammas and a son Peter Michael Roaman, two grandchildren, Benjamin Michael Roaman and Katherine Mixer and her husband Scott Mixer, and three great-grandchildren. Funeral services will be held today, Tuesday, January 5 at 10:30am at Temple Solel in Hollywood, FL. Interment will take place on Wednesday, January 6 at 11am at Mt. Lebanon Cemetery in Glendale, NY. 1/3
lead_paragraph: ROAMAN--Joyce, of Hollywood, FL, 89, passed away January 1, 2016. Joyce is predeceased by her husband Alan Norman Roaman and her son Michael Warren Roaman. Funeral services will be held today, Tuesday, January 5 at 10:30am at Temple Solel in Hollywood, FL. Interment will take place on Wednesday, January 6 at 11am at Mt. Lebanon Cemetery in Glendale, NY. 1/3
